channel.title: Other features on Using Markdown
channel.description: Recent content in Other features on Using Markdown

item.title: Others
item.description: Embedded videos We can display an embedded video with the following code: {{ < youtube 6H0jLIKe0uw > }}Here we can see a small introduction to Hugo. Buttons Continuing with the example of the previous video, instead of showing it we can put a button that links to the video and takes up less space on our website. To put the button you have to put the following syntax: {{ % button href="https://youtu.
